TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit NavigationCommands extends System.Object
public ref class NavigationCommands abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一组标准的与导航相关的命令。

span.span: Provides a standard set of navigation-related commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类公开一组标准的与导航相关的命令，包括浏览器和文档导航。The class exposes a standard set of navigation-related commands, including browser and document navigation. 有关命令和命令的详细信息，请参阅命令 [概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview)。For more information on commands and commanding, see [Commanding Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview).

summary.span: 获取表示 命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示要导航回日记中上一页的意图。This command indicates the intention to navigate back to the previous page in the journal. 和 实现对的响应的支持 ，尽管不需要使用它，但在许多情况下，对该命令的响应就是应用程序编写者的责任。 and implement support for responding to the , although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将 与结合使用 。The following example shows how to use in conjunction with a . 提供一个实现，该实现 通过导航回来来响应命令 （如果后端堆栈上有日志条目）。The provides an implementation that responds to the command by navigating the back, if there are journal entries on the back stack. [!code-xaml[NavigationCommandsSnippets#BrowseBackMARKUP1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationCommandsSnippets/CSharp/BrowseBack.xaml#browsebackmarkup1)] [!code-xaml[NavigationCommandsSnippets#BrowseBackMARKUP2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationCommandsSnippets/CSharp/BrowseBack.xaml#browsebackmarkup2)] [!code-xaml[NavigationCommandsSnippets#BrowseBackMARKUP3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationCommandsSnippets/CSharp/BrowseBack.xaml#browsebackmarkup3)] [!code-xaml[NavigationCommandsSnippets#BrowseBackMARKUP4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationCommandsSnippets/CSharp/BrowseBack.xaml#browsebackmarkup4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示向前导航日志中的下一页的意图。This command indicates the intention to navigate forward the next page in the journal. 和 实现对响应命令的支持 ，但你不需要使用它; 在许多情况下，用于响应该命令的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。 and implement support for responding to the command, although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将 与结合使用 。The following example shows how to use in conjunction with a . 提供了一种实现，该实现在向前 导航时通过向前导航来响应命令 。The provides an implementation that responds to the command by navigating the forward, if there are journal entries on the forward stack. [!code-xaml[NavigationCommandsSnippets#BrowseForwardMARKUP1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationCommandsSnippets/CSharp/BrowseForward.xaml#browseforwardmarkup1)] [!code-xaml[NavigationCommandsSnippets#BrowseForwardMARKUP2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationCommandsSnippets/CSharp/BrowseForward.xaml#browseforwardmarkup2)] [!code-xaml[NavigationCommandsSnippets#BrowseForwardMARKUP3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationCommandsSnippets/CSharp/BrowseForward.xaml#browseforwardmarkup3)] [!code-xaml[NavigationCommandsSnippets#BrowseForwardMARKUP4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationCommandsSnippets/CSharp/BrowseForward.xaml#browseforwardmarkup4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示开始导航的意图。This command indicates the intention to navigate home. 没有用于响应 任何给定类上的命令的实现 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 。There is no implementation for responding to the command on any given [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] class. 因此，您需要提供相应的实现，如示例中所示。As such, you need to provide an appropriate implementation, which is shown in the example. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现 与结合使用的命令 。The following example shows how to implement code that responds to the command in conjunction with a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示停止加载浏览器的意图。This command indicates the intention to stop the browser loading. 和 实现对响应命令的支持 ，但你不需要使用它; 在许多情况下，用于响应该命令的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。 and implement support for responding to the command, although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将 与结合使用 。The following example shows how to use in conjunction with a . 提供一个实现，该实现 通过停止当前导航来响应命令 。The provides an implementation that responds to the command by stopping the current navigation. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示导航日志的意图。This command indicates the intention to navigate the journal. 和 实现对响应命令的支持 ，但你不需要使用它; 在许多情况下，用于响应该命令的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。 and implement support for responding to the command, although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将 与结合使用 。The following example shows how to use in conjunction with a . 提供一个实现，该实现 通过导航到的向前或向后堆栈中的指定日记条目来响应命令 。The provides an implementation that responds to the command by navigating to the specified journal entry on either the forward or back stacks of the . 日志项由 向顶级提供 `Navigate Journal` 。The journal entries are provided by the to the top-level `Navigate Journal` . 每个日志条目都绑定到 使用命令的子 。Each journal entry is bound to a child that uses the command. [!code-xaml[NavigationCommandsSnippets#NavigateJournalMARKUP1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationCommandsSnippets/CSharp/NavigateJournal.xaml#navigatejournalmarkup1)] [!code-xaml[NavigationCommandsSnippets#NavigateJournalMARKUP2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationCommandsSnippets/CSharp/NavigateJournal.xaml#navigatejournalmarkup2)] [!code-xaml[NavigationCommandsSnippets#NavigateJournalMARKUP3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationCommandsSnippets/CSharp/NavigateJournal.xaml#navigatejournalmarkup3)] [!code-xaml[NavigationCommandsSnippets#NavigateJournalMARKUP4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NavigationCommandsSnippets/CSharp/NavigateJournal.xaml#navigatejournalmarkup4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示要前往下一页的意图。This command indicates the intention to go to the next page. 、 、 和 实现对响应命令的支持 ，但你不需要使用它; 在许多情况下，用于响应该命令的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。, , , and implement support for responding to the command, although you are not required to use it; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将 与结合使用 。The following example shows how to use in conjunction with a . 提供一个实现，该实现 通过转到下一页来响应命令。The provides an implementation that responds to the command by going to the next page.
